items.sentence: I wish Tom would eat what I give him without complaining.
When I got out of prison, my ex-wife and I got remarried.
When Tom came to, he was tied to a chair in the basement.
When Tom got the letter, he burned it without reading it.
I\'m sure we\'d be able to do this if we had Tom\'s help.
I wonder whether or not Tom is able to understand French.
I wonder whether or not Tom is going to Boston next week.
Tom put the apple pie and the pot of coffee on the table.
Tom took off his ski boots and put on a pair of slippers.
Tom was able to run faster than me when we were children.
